content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of boiler (position -17.5, 23.5), offshore pump (position -18.75, 23.0), and steam engine (position not specified).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and is connected to nearby electric poles.

### Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of stone furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of stone furnace (position 5.0, -73.0).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when removing entities
- Ensure the second argument is a Position object when attempting to remove an entity.

### Errors when adding fuel to boiler
- Ensure that there is a nearby entity that can accept coal before attempting to add fuel to the boiler.

### Errors retrieving entities
- Ensure that the entities are powered and exist at the specified positions before attempting to retrieve them.

### Errors when creating new entities
- Check if the entity already exists before creating a new one to avoid duplication.
